__TOC__


Here we have a sampling of bugs to work on for Hug Day.  After you have triaged or fixed a bug put your name in the last column and set the row's background to green by adding '''lightgreen''' in the first cell of the column after "background-color:" and before ";".  This will let people know that the bug in that row has been hugged.  

You might find it more convenient to edit the wiki page using <code>editmoin</code> a command line utility for editing moinmoin wiki pages.  It is available as a package in Gutsy and Hardy.  More information including an easier way to do this was <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-bugsquad/2007-November/000666.html|mailed]]</nowiki> to the Bug Squad. 

A really useful information on Firefox bugs can be found here on these pages <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MozillaTeam/Bugs|MozillaTeam/Bugs]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MozillaTeam/Bugs/Procedures|MozillaTeam/Bugs/Procedures]]</nowiki>

== Firefox 3.0 ==

=== Intro - New ===
AndresHerrera
'''Crashes:''' try to reproduce and ask for a step by step instruction to reproduce. Further, crashes are often caused by extensions/plugins -> ask to try with a fresh profile.

'''Feature Bugs:''' Try to reproduce. '''If you cannot reproduce''' ask for step by step instructions and ask the user to test with a fresh profile. '''If you can reproduce''', please test if its reproducible in upstream build. The beta 4 can be downloaded from http://releases.mozilla.org/pub/mozilla.org/firefox/releases/3.0b4/linux-i686/en-US/ ... to run you just untar it and run ./firefox in the extracted directory. '''If you can reproduce in upstream build''', try beta 5 to see if its been fixed upstream. Drop all that information to the bug.

=== 18 bugs in Incomplete status ===

Incomplete firefox-3.0 bugs without a response in more than a month according to launchpad.

'''To mark it off the list you should:'''
* Try to recreate the bug with latest package and set the status to Confirmed '''or'''
* Close the bug as Invalid is more than month has passed and no more information has been provided.
